Reviews.Title: Excellent HDTV for the price
Reviews.Author: Louis R. Primus
Reviews.Content: So far, I have no complaints.  This TV doubles as a monitor, and it serves that purpose well.  After dialing down the brightness and adjusting my computer's resolution to match the 1440 x 900 resolution of the TV, it looks great.  The connection is DVI (computer) to HDMI (TV).  The TV also has a VGA connection you could use, and I imagine the quality is just as good.Since I don't have HD service from my satellite provider, I get only standard resolution broadcast, so an s-video connection was fine for that.  Quality is so-so, but since I was more interested in the TV's use as a monitor, I'm not complaining.  I can always upgrade to HD later, or try out an antenna.

Reviews.Title: This TV is junk!
Reviews.Author: brownstone47
Reviews.Content: Save your money. I spent $249 on this junk. It lasted 2 years and 45 days before the picture kept going out. Not a good investment. Just past the extended warranty by 45 days. Buy something else.
